Entries.fall_Wed8: I wonder what Abigail is doing today. If you see her, let her know I'm thinking about her, okay?$h
Entries.winter_Wed4: I was just thinking it would be fun if Abigail and I played a game of Solarian Chronicles together...

Entries.summer_Fri6: Abigail and I want to explore the mines together one day. I guess you can say it’s our common goal that we’re working toward together.$h
Entries.Sat6: I had fun seeing Abigail at the saloon yesterday.$h#$b#We've been playing some Journey of the Prarie King together.$h

Entries.Thu8: If you ever see Abigail out in the mines, watch her back, okay?#$b#I don’t know what I would do if something happened to her.$s
Entries.winter_Mon6: The other day, Abigail and I went exploring in the mines...#$b#This slime showed up and I guess we got a bit scared before we made it anywhere interesting.$s

Entries.fall_Sat6: Sebastian, Sam, and I played Solarian Chronicles the other day.$h#$b#I had so much fun! I'm glad Sebastian invited me.$h#$b#Next time, you should come along too!$h

Entries.Sat6: I can’t wait until Sebastian and I play more ‘Journey of the Prairie King’ together. I’m impressed with how good he is at the game.$h#$b#Next time I see him at the saloon, I should make him play some with me!$h
Entries.summer_Wed6: I was thinking that I should go spend some time with Sebastian today. If you leave him alone for too long, he gets kind of gloomy.$h#$b#Oh, but do you think he'll be mad if I stop by unannounced?$s

Entries.summer_Mon8: Sebastian gave me this beautiful Amethyst the other day. He said he found it when he was down in the mines.$h#$b#I wonder how he knew that was my favorite gem...
Entries.winter_Sat6: Sebastian spends a lot of time alone, and I'm okay with that...$s#$b#Well, sometimes I wish he'd open up to me a bit more.$s
Entries.fall_Mon8: Sebastian and I tried to explore the mines the other day, but we didn't get very far.$s#$b#We plan on exploring the mines again someday. But, I hope we get a little farther next time!$h

Entries.Tue4: Abigail has been coming around more often lately.#$b#I think it's good for Sebastian to have someone his age that cares for him.$h
Entries.Fri4: Abigail has been a great influence on my Sebby.$h#$b#I'm so proud of him for meeting such a great girl.$h

Entries.Fri6: Sebastian, Abigail, and I are all be going to the saloon later tonight. But lately, Sebastian has been spending most of the night talking to Abigail... $s#$b#I'm happy that he's found someone he likes, but Friday nights can get a little boring now.$s#$b#Oh, but you could meet up with us tonight and keep me company.$h

Entries.Event_Advice1: I guess we do both like video games...#$b#Abigail isn't very good at some of them, but maybe I can give her some tips.$h
Entries.Event_Advice2: Oh, we could watch each other's backs down in the mines.$h

Entries.Event_Advice1: Oh, that's an awesome idea! He can give me some Prarie King tips maybe.$h
Entries.Event_Advice2: Oh, I still need to train a bit more, but one day maybe Sebastian and I could watch each other's backs down in the mines.$h

There was this one rock crab once... I barely got away!$h"/pause 500/speak Sebastian "Anyway, it's dangerous, so you should always make sure you're properly equipped and have enough spare life elixirs."/pause 200/speak Abigail "Yeah, that's why I've been saving up my allowance from helping out at the store. I was going to purchase some potions and head down into the mines...$h#$b#But since you're interested in it...why don't you come with me sometime? It might be fun!$h"/pause 200/speak Sebastian "That sounds great.$h#$b#Plus, it's safer together. We should plan on meeting up one night.$h"/pause 200/speak Abigail "Sounds like a plan!$h"/move Sam 6 0 1/speak Abigail "Wow, you still haven't died yet? Even with all this talking...that's pretty impressive, Sebastian.$7"/move Sam 5 0 0/speak Sebastian "I've just gotten a lot of practice. I couldn't miss out on my chance to challenge you to a game of pool, Sebastian!"/pause 200/speak Sebastian "Think you can win?$h"/pause 200/speak Sam "Only one way to find out! Let's go!$h"/move Sam 3 0 2/move Sam 0 2 1/faceDirection Sebastian 3/faceDirection Abigail 1/speak Sebastian "Hey, message me sometime about the mines. Entries.winter_Sun6: Alex and I are the best looking couple in town, don’t you think?$h
Entries.Wed8: I wonder if Alex will pose for a picture sometime?#$b#A photo shoot on the beach would be fun! Do you think he might even pose topless for me? *giggle*$h

Entries.fall_Wed6: Alex posed for me the other day.#$b#The pictures turned out really nice. I kind of want to keep some for myself.$l

Entries.winter_Mon8: If it was summer, Alex and I could go to the beach again.#$b#Hopefully it warms up soon...$s

Entries.summer_Wed8: Haley looked pretty good in her swimsuit the other day.$l

Entries.Sun6: Haley took some pictures of me the other day. I'm not totally against it, but it is a little embarassing.$h#$b#I guess if I want to go pro, I'll have to get used to being in the spotlight.$h

Entries.winter_Tue6: I can’t wait until summer so Haley and I can spend more time at the beach.$h
Entries.summer_Sun6: One of my favorite parts of summer is spending time with Haley at the beach.$l

Entries.Fri4: Haley and Alex get along well, don't they?$h

Entries.Mon6: I'm really thankful for everything Maru does at the clinic. I'd be lost without her.$h
Entries.Sat8: I’m glad Maru and I have gotten to know each other better. Thank you for giving me the courage to talk to her, @.

Entries.Fri6: The other day, Maru learned that my childhood dream was to be a pilot.#$b#It's kind of embarassing to open up to people about things like that. But in the end, I'm proud of the work I do as a doctor.$h

Entries.winter_Sat4: Maru made this invention that helped me see the sky as if I was in a plane. It was amazing.$h

Entries.Wed8: Working at the clinic may not be my dream job, but I enjoy spending time with Harvey and knowing I’m making a difference here in Pelican Town.
Entries.summer_Wed4: Harvey gave me this great idea for a new robot I could make! I can’t wait to get working on it.$h

Entries.summer_Thu6: When I was talking to Harvey the other day, I had this idea to help him achieve his dream.$h#$b#I have a lot of work ahead of me if I want to pull this off.

Entries.winter_Wed6: I'm glad Harvey likes the drone I made him. It ended up looking a little strange, but it made him happy.$h

Entries.Fri4: I think every father gets a little uneasy when his daughter starts dating...$s#$b#But I know Harvey is a good person.$h

Entries.Mon6: Harvey and Maru's relationship is getting more serious...#$b#I'm going to have to march down to the clinic and have a serious talk with Harvey about his intentions with my daughter.$4

Entries.303030300/o Maru/d Tue Thu/f Harvey 600/: musicboxsong/5 6/farmer 1000 1000 0 Harvey 9 5 0/skippable/playSound doorClose/warp farmer 6 12 0/faceDirection Harvey 2/pause 200/speak Harvey "Oh, @, I was just thinking that it would be nice to talk to you.$h"/pause 200/move farmer 0 -7 1/move farmer 2 0 1/faceDirection Harvey 3/speak Harvey "It's kind of strange...normally most of my thoughts are related to the wellbeing of Pelican Town's residents.#$b#But lately, this one girl has risen to the forefront of my mind.$l"/pause 200/speak Harvey "It's Maru...she's a brilliant woman, well-educated, and a great help here at the clinic.$h#$b#But I'm worried, since I'm her boss...$s#$b#Do you think it's wrong for me to have these feelings?$s"/pause 200/emote Harvey 40/speak Harvey "You seem to have things figured out, so I thought you might understand...#$b#I was wondering if you might lend me some advice?"/question fork1 "Give Harvey some advice?#Yes.#No."/fork noHarvey/emote Harvey 20/pause 500/addMailReceived HarveyMaru/speak Harvey "Talking to you will be so helpfu!"/pause 200/speak Harvey "$q 93 null#So, what kind of advice do you have for me?#$r 93 25 Event_Advice1#You should show some interest in her engineering hobby.#$r 93 25 Event_Advice2#You should tell her about your love for aircraft."/speak Harvey "Thank you, @!$h"/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/message "Harvey seems really encouraged! I think my advice helped."/end
Entries.noHarvey: playMusic none/pause 1000/speak Harvey "Oh...I see...$s#$b#If that's what you think...it probably is wrong for me to think of her that way.$s"/emote Harvey 28/pause 2000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/message "Harvey seems really discouraged. I don't think he'll approach Maru."/end

Entries.Event_Advice1: Oh, I would be interested to hear about that!$h
Entries.Event_Advice2: It's kind of embarassing, but it might give us something to talk about.

Entries.Event_Advice1: It's hard not to treat him like my boss when we're at the clinic, so that's a great idea!$h
Entries.Event_Advice2: Oh, I guess he might be interested in hearing about that.

Would you mind giving me some advice?"/question fork1 "Give Maru some advice?#Yes.#No."/fork noMaru/emote Maru 20/pause 500/addMailReceived HarveyMaru/speak Maru "Thank you, @!$h#$b#Talking to you will be so helpful!$h"/speak Maru "$q 93 null#So, what kind of advice do you have for me?#$r 93 25 Event_Advice1#You should meet up with him outside of your working hours.#$r 93 25 Event_Advice2#You should talk to him about your love for engineering."/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/message "Maru seems really encouraged! Entries.303030301/n HarveyMaru/p Maru: Hospital_Ambient/-1000 -1000/farmer 1000 1000 0 Maru 10 19 0 Harvey 1000 1000 0/skippable/changeSprite Maru Hospital/changePortrait Maru Hospital/playSound doorClose/viewport 10 11 true/speed Maru 3/move Maru 0 -5 0/textAboveHead Maru "*huff* *huff*"/pause 2500/speak Maru "Doctor Harvey! Are you up there?"/emote Maru 40/pause 500/speak Maru "I should check upstairs..."/playSound doorClose/doAction 10 5/move Maru 0 -4 0/pause 100/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/playMusic musicboxsong/changeLocation HarveyRoom/warp Maru 1000 1000 0/warp Harvey 4 5 1/showFrame Harvey 23/viewport 5 6 true/pause 1000/speak Harvey "This is Dr. H at 52 North 43.5 East seeking aerial response...is anyone out there?$9"/pause 200/playSound doorClose/warp Maru 6 12 0/pause 200/move Maru 0 -2 0/pause 100/changePortrait Maru Hospital/speak Maru "Doctor Harvey?"/emote Harvey 16/showFrame Harvey 30/jump Harvey/pause 500/move Harvey 2 0 2/speak Harvey "Oh, Maru!$8#$b#It's time for work, isn't it? I apologize. I must have lost track of time...$2"pause 100/move Maru 0 -3 0/speak Maru "Do you mind if I ask what you were doing, Doctor Harvey?"/pause 200/speak Harvey "Oh, it's a bit of a hobby of mine to try to make contact with any passing airplanes...$h#$b#Ever since I was younger, it was my dream to fly a plane one day...$h"/pause 200/speak Maru "You're a great doctor, Harvey...but why did you choose to become a doctor if your dream was to fly?$s"/pause 200/emote Harvey 40/speak Harvey "My poor eyesight...$s#$b#Plus my fear of heights is what deterred me.$s#$b#Someone who is afraid of heights could never be a proper pilot...$s"/pause 200/textAboveHead Maru "Hmm..."/pause 2500/speak Maru "I think I might have a way to help you fly, Harvey!$h#$b#A way where you don't need to leave the ground!$h"/pause 200/speak Harvey "Oh?$l#$b#B-but you don't need to worry about it Maru...$s#$b#I find my work as a doctor very rewarding.$h#$b#I've really enjoyed my time here, getting to know all the residents of Pelican Town.$h"/pause 200/emote Harvey 16/speak Harvey "Wait, if we're both up here...no one is downstairs to help any patients who might come in!$8"/pause 100/speed Harvey 3/move Harvey 1 0 2/speed Harvey 3/move Harvey 0 6 3/speed Harvey 3/move Harvey -1 0 2/speed Harvey 3/move Harvey 0 1 0/playSound doorClose/warp Harvey 1000 1000 0/faceDirection Maru 2/pause 200/emote Maru 40/speak Maru "I have the perfect idea to help Harvey fly.$h"/move Maru 0 5 0/playSound doorClose/warp Maru 1000 1000 0/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end

Entries.303030302/e 303030301/d Tue Thu/w sunny/: musicboxsong/-1000 -1000/farmer 1000 1000 0 Maru 34 52 2 Harvey 30 58 0/skippable/addTemporaryActor robot 35 42 35 52 2 false/showFrame robot 4/viewport 34 52 true/pause 200/move Harvey 0 -6 1/move Harvey 1 0 1/faceDirection Maru 3/speak Harvey "Maru? Why did you call me out here? Is someone hurt?$8"/move Harvey 2 0 1/speak Maru "Nothing like that...I had something I wanted to show you.$h"/pause 200/speak Harvey "Not medical related?"/pause 200/speak Maru "No, it's just...I wanted to give you something."/pause 200/emote Harvey 8/speak Maru "This robot..."/pause 200/faceDirection Maru 1/move Harvey 0 1 0/move Harvey 3 0 0/speak Harvey "What's this?$8"/pause 200/speak Maru "It's a robot, but it works kind of like a drone.#$b#You can make it fly into the air, and it has cameras that will take video of the entire experience!$h"/pause 200/speak Maru "You can fly, Harvey...$l#$b#You don't have to be afraid...$l"/pause 200/speak Harvey "Wow, Maru! That's amazing!$h#$b#Can you teach me how to use it?$h"/pause 200/speak Maru "Of course!$h"/pause 200/move Maru 0 1 0/move Maru 1 0 0/speak Maru "Here, it works like this..."/positionOffset Maru 2 0/pause 100/positionOffset Maru 2 0/pause 100/positionOffset Maru 2 0/pause 100/positionOffset Maru 2 0/pause 100/emote Maru 40/speak Maru "And once you've done all that, you can send it off like this...$h"/pause 100/screenFlash .5/pause 100/screenFlash .5/showFrame robot 8/pause 100/screenFlash .5/showFrame robot 1/pause 100/playSound robotBLASTOFF/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/warp robot -2000 -2000/pause 100/cutscene robot/viewport 34 52 true/faceDirection Harvey 3/faceDirection Maru 1/speak Maru "Oh, wow...that robot is really going far...$9#$b#It should come back down though...$s#$b#You might have more video of space than of earth!"/pause 200/speak Harvey "Either way, it's incredible, Maru! It's amazing to think we sent that robot off into the skies...$h#$b#It's exhilarating.$l#$b#And I'm glad I was able to share this wonderful experience with you, Maru.$l"/pause 1000/speak Harvey "Thank you Maru, for making my dreams a reality$l"/pause 500/speak Maru "I'm sorry it went a little farther than I intended.$s#$b#But I'm glad I could help.$l"/emote Maru 20/pause 1000/speak Maru "It's been a lot of fun spending time with you, Harvey.$l#$b#I'm so used to treating you like my boss...but these last few days have been a welcome  change.$h"/pause 200/speak Harvey "I feel the same way, Maru.$l#$b#You're a brilliant woman, and I'd love to get to know you better.$l"/emote Harvey 20/pause 200/speak Maru "...$l"/emote Maru 20/end

Entries.winter_Sun8: It would be fun to go sledding with Penny this year. I wonder if there's a good hill somewhere around here?

Entries.fall_Tue6: Penny said she wanted to play a game of Solarian Chronicles with me!$h#$b#I'll have to ask Sebastian if I can borrow the game for a few days.$h
Entries.Tue4: Penny is kind of quiet, but I think that’s one of the things that I’ve really come to like about her.$l#$b#She only says what’s important, you know?$h

Entries.winter_Fri6: The other day, I taught Penny how to play Solarian Chronicles.$h#$b#I wonder if we'll be able to hang out together again sometime...
Entries.winter_Tue4: I’ve been trying to write a new song for Penny. I thought it would be cool to show her how much she means to me.$h#$b#I wonder what kind of music she would like best...

Entries.Thu6: Sam has helped me break out of my shell a little, and I’m thankful for him.$h
Entries.fall_Sat8: Have you heard of the game Solarian Chronicles? Sam plays sometimes... I wonder if he'll let me join in next time?$h

Entries.Tue6: I've always wanted to play Solarian Chornicles, but didn't have anyone to play with.$s#$b#But now that Sam has offered to teach me, I'm so excited to have the opportunity to play with him!$h

Entries.summer_Fri6: Sam taught me how to play Solarian Chronicles the other day!$h#$b#I had so much fun. I hope he invites me again some time.$h
Entries.Wed6: I wonder what it would be like to marry a musician...$h#$b#Oh, don't mind me. I was just thinking aloud. *giggle*$h

Entries.Event_Advice1: Oh, that's a great idea! I've always wanted to play Solarian Chronicles, but I've never had anyone to play with before.$h
Entries.Event_Advice2: Maybe I can even ask him to play a song for me.$h

Entries.Thu6: I wonder if Elliott will let me draw him sometime? He would make for a beautiful subject...$l
Entries.Wed8: I’m running low on ideas for my next painting, so I was thinking of visiting Elliott sometime soon.$h

Entries.summer_Fri6: Elliott and I were exploring the forest and beach area the other day.$h#$b#It was so fun showing him all my favorite drawing places.$h

Entries.fall_Thu6: I visited Elliott the other day and he gave me a short piano lesson.$h#$b#Though it was a little nerve-wracking sitting so close to him on the piano bench.$l
Entries.winter_Sat4: I don't think anything inspires me more than listening to Elliott play the piano.$l

Entries.Tue6: Leah always inspires me. I’m so thankful to have met her.$h
Entries.winter_Mon4: Leah made me a special dish full of all kinds of vegetables she had foraged.$h#$b#It was surprisingly delicious! I had no idea she could cook so well!$h

Entries.summer_Wed4: Leah and I explored all around Pelican Town the other day.$h#$b#Spending time with her really inspired me, and I ended up writing a poem that I'm quite fond of.$h
Entries.fall_Mon4: Leah was teaching me some foraging tips the other day. It was fun exploring the forest with her.$h

Entries.Fri8: Leah was listening to me play the piano the other day, and she really seemed to enjoy it.$h#$b#I’m just happy to see her smile.
Entries.summer_Wed4: Leah came to visit me the other day. She seemed to like listening to me play the piano.$l#$b#I should give her a piano lesson at some point. I think she'd like that.$h

Entries.Event_Advice1: It is true that we both have our artistic interests.#$b#I would be interested in learning more about Elliott's musical and writing skills!$h
Entries.Event_Advice2: He does often go to the museum to research, doesn't he?#$b#Next time I see him, I should ask him about how it's going.$h

Entries.Event_Advice1: It is true that we both have our artistic interests.#$b#I would be interested in learning more about her sculpting skills!$h
Entries.Event_Advice2: That's a great idea!$h#$b#Next time I see her, I'll be sure to ask her about her latest piece.$h

We both ended up in Pelican Town, didn't we?$h#b#Ah, you probably know I'm talking about Leah...$l"/speak Elliott "Well, I know you seem to have things figured out, so I was wondering if you would give me any advice?"/pause 200/question fork1 "Give Elliott some advice?#Yes.#No."/fork noElliott/emote Elliott 20/pause 500/addMailReceived LeahElliott/speak Elliott "Thank you so much, @! I think my advice helped."/end

Entries.40276932/n LeahElliott/p Elliott/w sunny: ocean/42 19/Leah 39 11 2 Elliott 40 20 2/skippable/pause 200/emote Elliott 28/move Leah 0 9 1/pause 500/faceDirection Leah 2/speak Leah "Hey, Elliott. Enjoying the ocean?"/pause 1000/speak Elliott "*sigh*$s"/pause 500/faceDirection Leah 1/emote Leah 8/speak Leah "You alright, Elliott?"/pause 200/jump Elliott 8/emote Elliott 16/faceDirection Elliott 3/speak Elliott "Oh, Leah!$8#$b#Ah, my apologies. I was so lost in thought that I must not have noticed you there!"/pause 200/speak Leah "It's alright Elliott. You looked kind of sad, though. Is everything okay?"/pause 200/speak Elliott "Oh, I'm just suffering from some writer's block...$s"/pause 200/speak Leah "How terrible!$6"/pause 500/speak Leah "Hmm...whenever I'm not sure what to sculpt or paint next, I usually take a break and try to distract myself with something else for awhile.#$b#I find that if I explore a bit, I'm able to ease the burden on my mind and enhance my creative thinking.$h"/pause 200/speak Elliott "How interesting..."/pause 200/speak Leah "Well, would you like to explore a bit with me, Elliott?$h"/pause 200/speak Elliott "That sounds lovely, Leah.$h"/emote Elliott 32/pause 200/speak Leah "Let's go explore then!$h"/move Leah 0 -4 1/move Leah 2 0 1/move Elliott 0 -3 1/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/warp Elliott 81 10 3/warp Leah 80 10 3/faceDirection Elliott 2/faceDirection Leah 2/viewport 81 14 true/playMusic musicboxsong/pause 200/speak Leah "Wow!$h"/move Leah 0 3 2/speak Leah "Look at all these tide pools, Elliott!$h#$b#Aren't they beautiful?$h"/animate Leah false true 200 32 33 34 35/move Elliott 0 2 3/move Elliott 2 0 1/speak Elliott "Why, yes, they are quite beautiful.$h#$b#With the way the light bounces off the surface, it's like a sea of stars...$l"/pause 200/speak Leah "...$h"/pause 2000/stopAnimation Leah/speak Leah "Let's head somewhere else, next!"/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/changeLocation Woods/warp Elliott 26 14 1/warp Leah 29 14 3/viewport 27 12 true/playSound leafrustle/pause 500/move Leah 0 -3 2/animate Leah false true 200 35 32 33 35/speak Leah "We're surrounded by trees. Who knows how old they are...#$b#Isn't that inspiring, Elliott?$h"/move Elliott 0 -2 2/speak Elliott "It is!$h"/emote Elliott 40/speak Elliott "...high above the tallest trees...then, above...#$b#Hmm..."/pause 2000/speak Leah "Well, we should head back now..."/stopAnimation Leah/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/changeLocation Beach/warp Elliott 49 12 3/warp Leah 44 12 1/viewport 49 12 true/move Leah 4 0 1/pause 200/speak Leah "...are you feeling inspired?$h"/pause 200/faceDirection Elliott 3/pause 200/speak Elliott "Leah...$l"/pause 500/speak Elliott "To sail upon the sea of stars, above mountains and oceans, and high above the tallest trees...#$b#Then above, to look on at...the worlds we've walked upon.$l"/pause 200/speak Elliott "What did you think?$l"/pause 200/speak Leah "Wow, Elliott! Are you sure you still have writer's block?$l#$b#That was a beautiful poem...$l"/pause 500/speak Elliott "Oh, Leah! I think your idea of exploring has really helped inspire me!$h#$b#I will dedicate this poem to you.$l"/emote Elliott 20/pause 200/speak Leah "Oh, wow.$l#$b#Thank you Elliott.$l#$b#I'm just glad I could help though...$h"/pause 200/speak Elliott "From here on out, I think I'll have to practice exploring when my ideas are running thin.$h#$b#Thank you Leah.$l#$b#Now, if you'll excuse me, I need to write down all these thoughts racing through my head!"/pause 200/speed Elliott 4/move Elliott 0 -1 0/warp Elliott 1000 1000 0/playSound doorClose/speak Leah "...$l"/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end

Entries.Tue4: I wonder if Emily would like this Amethyst I found the other day...$h

Entries.Fri6: Emily came to visit me the other day. It turns out she had some geodes that needed to be broken.$h#$b#Thanks to your advice, I was able to have a normal conversation with her! I think it went really well.$h
Entries.Thu2: Emily asked me to go to the desert with her. I'm excited to spend some time with her.$l

Entries.Thu6: I was so nervous, but I ended up giving Emily a necklace I made. She seemed to like it, and it looked so beautiful on her.$h#$b#She even said she might like me as more than just a friend!$l#$b#I don't think I've ever been happier, @. Thank you for all your support.$h

Entries.Thu4: I was thinking I should stop by and say hi to Clint!$h#$b#Well... I hope I wouldn't be interrupting his work.
Entries.winter_Tue4: It's so cold outside... but I'm sure it would be toasty next to Clint's forge.$l
Entries.summer_Fri6: I've been thinking about Clint more and more ever since our date at the Grampleton Carnival.#$b#I wonder if he's been thinking about me, too...$l

Entries.Sun6: My friend Sandy sent me some geodes the other day, so I gave them to Clint to process.#$b#I'm so excited to see what gems are inside!$h

Entries.fall_Sat8: Do you see this necklace I'm wearing?$h#$b#Clint made me this beautiful aquamarine necklace from one of my geodes he cracked open.$h
Entries.winter_Fri6: I don't know what shocked me more... that Clint confessed to me or that I might have feelings for him, too!$l

Entries.Event_EmilyAdvice1: I guess I do just get so nervous sometimes.$s
Entries.Event_EmilyAdvice2: That'll be hard, but I can try!$h
